name: Syrosia
startIntroPart1: Syrosia is a nation of nerdy tree-huggers who want to spread a doctrine of peace, love, harmony with nature, global unity, and humptiness forever.
startIntroPart2: Lead this nation and thereby the world toward sustainable peace and greatness.
declaringWar: We really didn't want to have to do this, but sometimes violence IS the answer.
attacked: Prepare to face the consequences of your poor decisions and inability to see the bigger picture.
defeated: This is proof that the path to world piece and a global community is not linear. The war isn't over until all wars are over.
introduction: Greetings, comrades! We hope you feel welcomed among our community.
hateHello: We don't have time for your self-righteous, greedy delusions.
hateLetsHearIt: Speak now or forever hold your peace.
hateNo: I'd perish before sinking to that level!
afterPeace: We have bridged yet another chasm that was holding our species back. Cheers for unity! For peace!
uniques: All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
